dcterms:creator: B. M. Lake
R. Salakhutdinov
J. Gross
J. B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: Omniglot consists of black-and-white images of handwritten characters gathered from 50 languages, totaling 1632 different classes with 20 instances per class. The dataset is used for few-shot image classification.
dcterms:title: Omniglot

dcterms:creator: O. Vinyals
C. Blundell
T. Lillicrap
D. Wierstra
dcterms:description: Mini-ImageNet is a subset of the well-known ImageNet dataset, consisting of 84x84 color images from 100 different classes with 600 instances per class. It is used for few-shot image classification.
dcterms:title: mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Y. Duan
J. Schulman
X. Chen
P. L. Bartlett
I. Sutskever
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: Multi-armed bandits involve an agent interacting with a set of arms whose reward distributions are unknown, requiring exploration and exploitation strategies.
dcterms:title: Multi-armed bandits

dcterms:creator: Y. Duan
J. Schulman
X. Chen
P. L. Bartlett
I. Sutskever
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: Tabular MDPs are defined by states and actions where the reward for each state-action pair follows a normal distribution, and transitions are sampled from a flat Dirichlet distribution.
dcterms:title: Tabular MDPs

dcterms:creator: Y. Duan
J. Schulman
X. Chen
P. L. Bartlett
I. Sutskever
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: Visual navigation involves an agent navigating randomly-generated mazes to find a randomly-located goal using only visual observations as input.
dcterms:title: Visual navigation

dcterms:creator: C. Finn
P. Abbeel
S. Levine
dcterms:description: Continuous control involves a suite of simulated locomotion tasks where robots must run in a particular direction or at a specified velocity.
dcterms:title: Continuous control
